title: Ways You Can Have Fun
itunes:author: Guest: Kevin Leman
itunes:summary:
As a parent, it's good to have fun with your children. Even if you're not the naturally, fun-loving type, John and Danny will give some ideas for how you can have a good time with your kids. Featuring Dr. Kevin Leman and Jean Daly.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive the book "Why Your Kids Misbehave--And What to Do About It" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-05-31?refcd=1430807

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/ways-you-can-have-fun/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/understanding-the-root-of-your-child-s-misbehavior-digital/?refcd=1430807

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
